Title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Mystery, Thriller, War
Writer: John Orloff (screenplay), Emil Stern (screenplay), Kathryn Lasky (novels)
Actors: Emily Barclay, Abbie Cornish, Essie Davis, Adrienne DeFaria
Plot: Soren, a young barn owl, is kidnapped by owls of St. Aggie's, ostensibly an orphanage, where owlets are brainwashed into becoming soldiers. He and his new friends escape to the island of Ga'Hoole, to assist its noble, wise owls who fight the army being created by the wicked rulers of St. Aggie's.
